This Website uses Trackers managed directly by the Owner (so-called “first-

3rd Party Cookies

The services contained in this section enable the Owner to monitor and analyse
web traffic and can be used to keep track of User behaviour.

Google utilizes the Data collected to track and examine the use of this
Website, to prepare reports on its activities and share them with other Google
services.

Google may use the Data collected to contextualize and personalize the ads of
its own advertising network.
